content:
Creating a comprehensive table for all of Seattle sports is challenging, but I can provide you with a list of some of the most notable athletes and their jersey numbers across various sports in Seattle. Please note that this list is subjective and by no means exhaustive.

| Number | Athlete | Years in Seattle | Team |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Warren Moon | 1997-1998 | Seattle Seahawks (NFL) |
| 3 | Russell Wilson | 2012-2021\* | Seattle Seahawks (NFL) |
| 11 | Edgar Martinez | 1987-2004 | Seattle Mariners (MLB) |
| 12 | 12th Man (Fans) | 1976-present\* | Seattle Seahawks (NFL) |
| 14 | Bobby Wagner | 2012-2021\* | Seattle Seahawks (NFL) |
| 15 | Jermaine Kearse | 2012-2017 | Seattle Seahawks (NFL) |
| 20 | Gary Payton | 1990-2003 | Seattle SuperSonics (NBA) |
| 22 | Robinson Cano | 2014-2018 | Seattle Mariners (MLB) |
| 24 | Ken Griffey Jr. | 1989-1999, 2009-2010 | Seattle Mariners (MLB) |
| 24 | Marshawn Lynch | 2010-2015, 2019 | Seattle Seahawks (NFL) |
| 30 | Shawn Kemp | 1989-1997 | Seattle SuperSonics (NBA) |
| 34 | Felix Hernandez | 2005-2019 | Seattle Mariners (MLB) |
| 40 | Shawn Springs | 1997-2003 | Seattle Seahawks (NFL) |
| 51 | Randy Johnson | 1989-1998 | Seattle Mariners (MLB) |
| 51 | Ichiro Suzuki | 2001-2012, 2018 | Seattle Mariners (MLB) |
| 71 | Walter Jones | 1997-2008 | Seattle Seahawks (NFL) |
| 79 | Jacob Green | 1980-1991 | Seattle Seahawks (NFL) |
| 96 | Cortez Kennedy | 1990-2000 | Seattle Seahawks (NFL) |

\*Knowledge cutoff date: September 2021, so years and teams may be different for those players still active in their respective sports.
